definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: A dilapidated house stands disconsolately amid the rabbles.
sentences.chinese: 一棟破舊的房子淒涼地聳立在斷垣殘壁中。

sentences.english: Opposing tyranny, he led a poor life, and was very miserable in his late years.
sentences.chinese: 由於反抗暴政，他過得很窮苦，晚境淒涼。

sentences.english: Complain not, no matter how bleak it seems.
sentences.chinese: 不要怨天尤人，無論現在看來是怎麼地黯淡淒涼。

sentences.english: That lock fog valley through rhododendron bleak new sad shouting.
sentences.chinese: 那霧鎖的山谷中新透杜鵑淒涼的悲哀叫喊。

sentences.english: The gulls went in slanting flight up the wind toward the gray desolate east.
sentences.chinese: 海鷗斜着翅膀迎着海風朝灰暗淒涼的東方飛去。

sentences.english: So they are the bleakest group of our society.
sentences.chinese: 所以他們才成爲我們社會最淒涼的人。

sentences.english: Most desolating were those evenings the belle-mere had envisaged for them.
sentences.chinese: 最最淒涼的要數婆婆給她們設計的夜晚。

sentences.english: This doesn’t, ofcourse, mean that Firefox is facing a bleak future.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這並不意味着火狐的前景將會一片淒涼。

sentences.english: Africa will be the highlight of an otherwise dismal year.
sentences.chinese: 非洲將是這異常淒涼的一年裏的亮點。

sentences.english: Revenue father rarely, the whole family to live in a difficult and miserable.
sentences.chinese: 父親收入很少，全家生活既艱苦又淒涼。

sentences.english: He must go the dreary round of his mind again and find out.
sentences.chinese: 他還得在心靈的淒涼的路上重新走一遍，把它找出來。

sentences.english: Everywhere are the collapsed buildings, such as death or injury to life, a bleak.
sentences.chinese: 所到之處，都是殘垣斷壁如死傷的生命，一片淒涼。

sentences.english: As cool as it sounds, there’s a sort of forlorn feel to the place.
sentences.chinese: 像傳聞中那個酷，這地方有一中淒涼的感覺。

sentences.english: Frank's piece, "The Bleakness Stakes, " isn't yet freely available online.
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克的作品《淒涼關係》暫時在網上還找不到。

sentences.english: Miserable latter two do not should with, most is the clear resentmentmonth is extremely bright…
sentences.chinese: 淒涼別後兩應同，最是不勝清怨月明中。

sentences.english: Yan had no information on the enemy, sober Canmeng send bleak.
sentences.chinese: 雁過故人無信息，酒醒殘夢寄淒涼。

definition: to rustle in the air/to rustle/to sough/bleak/desolate/chilly
ecstasy/rapture/to feel overwhelming joy or sorrow
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
